exceptions.exn: The reference H_inf was not found in the current environment.
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
The reference eps was not found in the current environment.
The reference H_sup was not found in the current environment.

original: intros u l. split. - intros H_inf n eps. specialize (H_inf eps). split. + intros n0. specialize (H_inf n0). rewrite Rbar_opp_involutive. apply H_inf. + intros. apply H_inf. - intros H_sup eps. assert (eps' : posreal) by apply (cond_pos eps). specialize (H_sup eps'). split. + intros n. specialize (H_sup n). rewrite Rbar_opp_involutive. apply H_sup. + intros. apply H_sup.
